name: Sgt Ginger's Last Stand
description:
You are Sgt Ginger, the sole survivor of GingerMoon.  Using your trusty CandyLight-15 AssaultCane and voxel building capabilities you are tasked with defending the 32 gumdrops at the planets core from the hording snowmen which have come to attack your planet.

Controls:

  • left mouse button- shoot
  • middle mouse button - mine Block
  • right mouse button - place block
  • WASD + space - movement and jump

This project was made for libGDX Jam December 2019.

Music Credits: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZX4Q1EF9tzQ
